alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:07PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 808.0 feet, Storm sewer valve at Reach 3 (north cemetery) is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 807.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Saturday was 807.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 808.0 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
